thread.title: San Bernardino gunman plotted to kill for eight YEARS
thread.title_full: San Bernardino gunman plotted to kill for eight YEARS

title: San Bernardino gunman plotted to kill for eight YEARS
text: show ad EXCLUSIVE: San Bernardino gunman plotted to kill Americans for eight YEARS - and friend he groomed into radical Islam planned string of terror attacks with him Enrique Marquez Jr, 25, is pleading guilty to providing material support for terrorism - to Syed Rizwan Farook and wife Tashfeen Malik The husband and wife couple murdered 14 in San Bernardino in December 2015, at the time the worst domestic terror attack since 9/11 Now court documents reveal how Marquez told the FBI Farook converted him to Islam in 2007 - eight years before the attacks Farook was 19 when he began grooming Marquez, then just 14, into a radical Islamist The two watched the speeches of now dead preacher of hate Anwar al Awlaki and plotted other terror attacks including using pipe bombs on an interstate Published: 14:00 GMT, 16 February 2017 | Updated: 14:23 GMT, 16 February 2017 9 shares
